Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Wanshi, why did you put such a strange tasting can in your maintenance capsule?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Not even Camu could've choked that down.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I could smell it a mile away. I thought your recovery room had been raided by mustard gas.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Kamui's noisy voice projected from the direction of Wanshi's recovery room."}
{3: 'Through the opened door of the recovery room, Wanshi sees the cans that he had put in the cabinet.'}
{3: "Kamui accidentally discovered a slightly swollen metal can in Wanshi's storage. It reminded Wanshi of his distant past."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory10.jpg'}
{3: 'Broken stone slabs and steel bars stand in the ruins. Smoke and dust in the air cast an oppressive haze on the area.'}
{3: 'The surrounding craters speak to the kind of devastation wrought on this land.'}
{3: 'Oil flows quietly along the terrain, filling craters along the way and finally gathering in recesses of the street.'}
{3: 'A pair of military boots steps into a puddle, causing black ripples to disturb the oily surface.'}
{3: 'The ripples bump into a mechanical arm submerged in the oil. Right at that moment, the mechanical arm seems to receive a signal, stirring it from silence.'}
{3: 'It twitches wildly, grabbing onto the surrounding wreckage as it tries to free its broken limbs from the crushing weight of the ruins.'}
{3: 'Finally, its attempt at dragging itself out is ended by the dull thud of a gunshot.'}

{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Looks like there are some stragglers. I thought all of Corrupted near the southern defensive line were alerted by the large-scale clean-up and suppression operation led by the Egrets.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The shooter slings the rifle on his shoulder while it is still cooling down, then looks down at the Corrupted he had just stopped from moving.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Wanshi, the file I'm looking for still isn't popping up on the scan. What about you?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "Come on. Is that you yawnin' again? Are you workin' or what?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Um... You could say that...', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Dammit... He fell asleep again.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Troy... You should probably lie down for a second.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hearing the sudden sound on the silent comms, the Construct known as Troy performs a tactical roll to the side, avoiding a burst of air as it ruptures by his ear.'}
{3: 'It was the sound of the attack from a large Corrupted suddenly appearing in front of Troy. Building debris and the remains of smaller Corrupted fall off its torso.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'As Troy raises his gun and aims at the large Corrupted, a silver orb of light fires from the direction where he last stood.'}
{3: 'Following the blast, the Corrupted begins to disintegrate from one of its arms. The mechanical joints shatters into fragments and splashes into the oil-filled crater.'}
{3: 'Finally, a silver orb of light penetrates the fractured memory shell towering off to the side. It falls backward from the inertia of the impact, leaving mechanical residue on the ground.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Yawns— Another bites the dust. Take five.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Troy gets up and looks back. He sees Wanshi, who is standing on the overlooking precipice off in the distance, stretch his arms and then lay down lethargically.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Troy', 3: 'Hey, knock it off! Quit sleeping on the job!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Relax. That was the last one...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Hmph, what makes you say that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'While you were running around looking for the data files...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I was here scanning for enemies and taking them out. I didn't even have to move an inch. Quick and easy...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Fine, whatever.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Troy sighs, then climbs over a structure and continues to search the ruins.'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Anyway, the ruins sure are quiet.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Hey, Wanshi. When did you join Strike Hawk?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "Now that you're awake, I figured I'd ask while I still had the chance. You've been dozing on and off, so I didn't want to bother.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Sigh... Doze off again?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'It just happed by some weird twist of fate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "Perhaps due to Wanshi's sudden response over the comms or because he was not expecting that answer, either way, Troy slips while climbing the crumbling wall to the ruins."}
{3: 'Right as Troy is about to fall off the wall, he hears the revving of an engine underfoot. A faint white light appears underneath him, steadily catching him in midair.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Troy', 3: 'Phew... Scared me there for a second.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Troy pats his chest with a free hand, then places his feet back on a sturdy section of the crumbling wall. After regaining his footing, he continues to climb.'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "Fate, huh? That's nice.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "I heard that scouts don't have to go to the front line. That's why I joined.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'But you Strike Hawks are in a league of your own.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Yawn... Like... some sorta elite team?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "Of course. What scout hasn't heard of Strike Hawk?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "But don't elite teams usually have a human called... um... a commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "That's just an ordinary elite team. Don't you know who your Captain is?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "Chrome is a perfect Construct equipped with a specialized Inver-Device who is responsible for serving as the team's commandant.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Oh, and the other Strike Hawks are equally one in a million. Any mission with Strike Hawk is virtually guaranteed to be a success.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "You don't say... I just thought there was something special about our Captain and Kamui.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "How could you be so oblivious to all of this? You don't know how much I envy you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'As for me, my combat abilities are as ordinary as they come.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "All I can do is run fast and keep my mouth shut. That's why Commander Nikola assigned me to this mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "Honestly, I may not be afraid to fight Corrupted, but I won't be first in line to fight them head-on.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'So, thanks for the help just now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Hmph, it was nothing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Haha, no need to be so modest. It was an honest compliment. Just take it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After climbing to the top of the crumbling wall while chatting with Wanshi, Troy can now scan the large area below.'}
{3: 'Troy sees patches of Corrupted and human remains piled up on the ground, alluding to a tragic battle that had taken place here.'}
{3: 'Troy bows his head in a moment of silence, then jumps down from the crumbling wall and continues onward.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory11.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Troy', 3: 'Surely enough... This city was lost during the Post-Pandemic Age, too.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "But scenes like this bloodbath here are the real reason I won't step foot on the front line.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "It's ridiculous that soldiers pay their lives in exchange for a total retreat.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "We're supposedly bound by duty to carry out orders.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "But every time I see these scenes, I still can't help ask these questions from the bottom of my heart.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'However, the answers to these questions are even more troubling...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Troy smiles somberly, then tapped the position of his temple, causing a fluorescent panel to pop up in front of his eyes.'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "It's not here either.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Wanshi, when will this endless war end?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Uh... I don't know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "What a pity. If one person dies on the battlefield, they're a hero. Ten people, they're martyrs. One million people, they're just a statistic.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'We already sacrificed so many people.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Is it true that our mission will only truly be complete once we achieve victory and humanity has taken back Earth?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "...I don't know. But I had a dream about us winning the war recently.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'A spark spreads from a faint orb of light, igniting change all around the world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Finally, the spark ignites the entire Earth, but gradually fades after burning...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Even if we win a temporary victory against the Corrupted, the Punishing Virus won't be eradicated so easily...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'It was just a dream though.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "It's just not a dream...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'The Punishing Virus has caught us off guard more than once.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Just as human beings have spent millions of years building their own civilization on the surface of Earth...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'The Punishing Virus is also adapting and corrupting the land in its own way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "If we don't find a way to eradicate it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'When conditions such as environment and time align, one day the Punishing Virus will evolve into an existence beyond our comprehension.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "Well... But at least it hasn't come to that yet, has it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "It's always best to plan ahead, but we still need to live in the present. Right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The comm link becomes silent again. Thoughts fills the M.I.N.D.s of Troy and Wanshi. They continue to perform their respective tasks in radio silence.'}
